aiInsights.summary: CRITICAL: Your health data indicates severe systemic issues requiring immediate emergency medical attention. Extremely high protein levels suggest acute kidney dysfunction, while severe gastrointestinal inflammation with dangerous bacterial infection is present. Dehydration and high fever indicate potential sepsis risk.
recommendations: EMERGENCY: Seek immediate medical attention - multiple critical indicators
URGENT: Hospital evaluation needed for kidney function and infection
Immediate IV fluids required for severe dehydration
Antibiotic treatment needed for C. difficile infection
Continuous monitoring of vital signs and kidney function
Strict isolation protocols due to infectious agent
Family/caregiver should be notified of critical condition
